formalpara.title: NAFCSR.FTTx.REPAIR.Diagnostics
formalpara.para: Sets the list of tests that are offered by the @@FieldAppName@@ for FTTX Repair jobs. The contents of this variable should be a comma-separated list of tests. The default value is NAF_OperationalStatus, NAF_History_WF, NAF_PowerBudget, NAF_PONDiagnostics.
